post.text:
Thank you to President Enrique Pena Nieto - for the invitation to meet with him in Mexico City, Mexico. Wonderful leadership and high quality people! I look forward to our next meeting. 
-Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Chelsie
comment.text: Until yesterday, I never considered that there is trafficking across the border into Mexico of cash and weapons...duh! If course there is! No wonder so many do not want to build this wall...I wonder how deep the government corruption goes into that enterprise!ðŸ˜

replies.author: James
replies.text: well given the US government has (for decades) been involved in gun running and trying to affect international politics with underhanded movements im guessing pretty deep. Maybe ask the Bush's, after all Senior effectively created the Taliban.

replies.author: Chelsie
replies.text: Oh God! Here we go with the Bush bashing again! Yeah and Hillary and Obama, created Isis! So the story goes. No reason to drag the Bushes name through the mud anymore that is old news! The current players are Clinton, Obama, and Trump!

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: They caught 2 last week going into Mexico carrying 3 million back to them. 1 was a Mexican and 1 was American. They got to get that drug money back or the cartels will be sending someone over here to kill them.

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: James How about you also ask the Clintons and OWEbama.. They are ALL complicit in it, which is why the RINOs don't want Mr Trump. Their gravy train will dry up.
